title: 进服、退服、死亡报错
author: 莫零ya
txt_content:
[20:35:58 WARN]: org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException: unacceptable character '
in "'string'", position 0
[20:35:58 WARN]: at org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration.loadFromString(YamlConfiguration.java:57)
[20:35:58 WARN]: at org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration.load(FileConfiguration.java:226)
[20:35:58 WARN]: at org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration.load(FileConfiguration.java:169)
[20:35:58 WARN]: at com.github.supavitax.itemlorestats.ItemLoreStats$ItemLoreStatsListener$2.run(ItemLoreStats.java:1804)
[20:35:58 WARN]: at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:59)
[20:35:58 WARN]: at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:53)
[20:35:58 WARN]: at org.github.paperspigot.ServerSchedulerReportingWrapper.run(ServerSchedulerReportingWrapper.java:23)
[20:35:58 WARN]: at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
[20:35:58 WARN]: at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
[20:35:58 WARN]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[20:35:58 WARN]: Caused by: unacceptable character '
in "'string'", position 0
[20:35:58 WARN]: at org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.StreamReader.checkPrintable(StreamReader.java:67)
[20:35:58 WARN]: at org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.StreamReader.<init>(StreamReader.java:47)
[20:35:58 WARN]: at org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml.load(Yaml.java:369)
[20:35:58 WARN]: at org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration.loadFromString(YamlConfiguration.java:55)
[20:35:58 WARN]: ... 9 more
[20:35:58 INFO]: *********** Failed to load player data for mengxiao_su when logging in! ***********

综上所述每次进、退服、死亡就会这样

replies.author: North丶Kraken
replies.txt_content: 好像是ILS的问题……是不是某个yml配置文件的文件名用了中文或者其他字符哦

replies.author: 莫零ya
replies.txt_content:
North丶Kraken 发表于 2018-10-30 12:50
好像是ILS的问题……是不是某个yml配置文件的文件名用了中文或者其他字符哦 ...
谢谢提示，已解决
